You drunken bastard! As the drunk, you are still just a villager. BUT! If the wolves kill you, they will become disabled for the next kill, as they are drunk off your insanely high BAC.

A bit trigger happy are we? As the gunner, you are given 2 silver bullets at the beginning of the game. Each day, you will have the chance to shoot another player. Once you do, everyone will know you are the gunner! Be careful though, you only have 2 bullets!

Love is in the air. As Cupid, you will choose two players at the start of the game. These two players will become madly in love! If one of them dies, the other will die of sorrow :( Note: Lovers will know who each other are, but not be told their roles. If the lovers are the last two alive, they win, regardless of teams. If the lovers are on different teams (villager + wolf), and one team wins (wolf), the lover (villager) wins as well. TL;DR if at least one of the lovers was on the winning team, they both win together.

A trigger happy, vindictive player. As the hunter, you try to keep to yourself. However, when others come to visit you, they may find themselves dead, as your paranoia takes hold and you shoot. If the wolves attack you, you have a chance to take one of them with you. Otherwise, if you die, you will get a chance to shoot someone as you die. ู ูุงุญุธุฉ: ุจุงููุณุจุฉ ููุฌูู ุงูุฐุฆุงุจุ ุชุจุฏุฃ ุงููุณุจุฉ ู ู 30%. ุฅู ูุงู ููุงู ุฐุฆุจู ูุงุญุฏุ ููุฏู ุงูุตูุงุฏ ุฅุญุชู ุงู ุจูุณุจุฉ 30% ุจุฃู ููุชู ุงูุฐุฆุจ (ูููุฌู). ููู ุฐุฆุจู ุฅุถุงููุ ุฃุถู 20% (2 ุฐุฆุงุจ = 50%ุ 3 ุฐุฆุงุจ = 70%ุ ุฅูุฎ). ู ุน ุฐูู - ุฅู ูุงู ููุงู ุฐุฆุงุจู ุนุฏูุฏุฉุ ุจููู ุง ูุฏ ุชุชู ูู ู ู ูุชู ุฃุญุฏูู ุ ูุณูุธููู ู ุชููููู ุนููู ุนุฏุฏูุง ูุชููุชู. ุฅุฐุง ุญุงููุช ุงูุทุงุฆูุฉ ุชุญููููุ ููุฏููู ุฅุญุชู ุงู ุจูุณุจุฉ 50% ูููุดู. ูุฅู ูุดููุง ููุฏูู ุฅุญุชู ุงู ุจูุณุจุฉ 50% ููุชู ุฃุญุฏูู !

ุงูุญุฏุงุฏ โ

As mayor, you are a lowly villager, until you reveal yourself. Then you are given twice the vote count for lynching (meaning that your vote is twice as powerful as everyone else's). Use that power wisely to help the Village Team.

The prince is a key role in the Village Team's strategy. Once the prince gets lynched, their role as Prince is revealed, and they survive. However, this can only happen once: if the village insists on lynching them, they will die.
Do you remember the good old seer? Well now, it has its Wolf Team counterpart. The sorcerer is the Wuff's Seer. They can only see if someone is Wolf or Seer, and they win with the Wolves.

You are the Clumsy Guy. Maybe you should not have had so much alcohol for breakfast. You can't see a damn thing. Can you even vote for the person you want to? (You have a 50% chance to vote for someone random.)

You are the BlackSmith. Through the years, no blades nor swords gave you as much satisfaction as the Silver Blades the elves ordered.\nYou might have some silverdust left. Who knows ? It might *prevent Wolves from eating tonight* ๐ค
You are the Alpha Wolf, the origin of the curse, the bane of banes. Every night, there's 20% chance that you will bite your pack's meal, and they will join your ranks instead of dying!

What a cuuuute little wuff. _tickles tickles_ -cough cough- As i was saying, you are the Wolf Cub and you _drops the mic_ -I just can't resist that. I think if anyone killed you, I'd give the wuffs two victims. You're too cute to die. I wouldn't be able to tickle you anymore-

You are a lowly villager, but since you spend most of your time in the woods where there are real wolves, the Seer will get confused and think you are a werewolf! Oh no....
The lycan is a wolf, but will appear to be a villager to the seer
The oracle will be told what role someone is NOT, choosing from roles that are still alive in the game
Once per game, the sandman can make all players sleep so deeply that nobody can use their night actions
The Pacifist can choose to convince everyone in your village not to lynch anyone. This can only be done once.

The Wise Elder ๐ can survive a werewolf attack once - the second time they can eat you up. If the Gunner or Hunter kill you with their abilities, they will lose their powers out of sorrow and will be converted to a normal villager.

You are the Thief ๐! Since the [Full Thief] mode is turned on, you get 50% chance to steal a player's role every night, if successful, that player will become the new thief and continues with the theft!

By default, the Thief ๐ can steal a player's role on the first night and turn that player into a villager.\nIf the [Full Thief] mode is turned on, they get 50% chance to steal a player's role every night, if successful, that player will become the new thief and continues with the theft!

ุงูู ุดุงุบุจ ๐คฏ
The Troublemaker is the raging teenager in town. When they start yelling, the whole village gets out of control. To gain silence, they will lynch twice that day!

The chemist is a quite crazy person who likes to brew potions and mess up with them. They mix two potions and force other people to choose one to drink, while the chemist will drink the other. However, while one potion is just tasting like rosebuds, the other one is going to kill you instantly. Good luck when they visit you!

The Snow Wolf ๐บโ๏ธ is a wolf that was native to the snowcapped mountains near the village. As such, they have mastered the art of controlling ice and snow. Having lived alone for a long time, the Snow Wolf prefers to operate alone. Instead of hunting with their pack at night, they can pick a separate victim to freeze, which causes them to be unable to use their night actions. However, they will still have some residue of the Snow Wolf's magic the next night, causing them to be immune to the Snow Wolf for one night.
Shuffle player list every time? Current: {0}
Player list will be shuffled every time: {0}

You are the Grave Digger โ๏ธ. Every night, you dig the graves for all the people who died since the last time you did (yes, even werewolves deserve a proper burial). Since you are out all night, wolves and the cult can't find you, unless you actually have nothing to do (i.e. no one died), in that case you'll just stay home. Everyone who visits you has a chance of falling into your newly dug graves, depending on how many graves you dug. Also, the chance is halved for everyone who is on the village team with you. But since you are out at night, the wolves or the serial killer might spot and kill you, and the more graves you have to dig, the more likely it is. Also, apparently the serial killer can find you whether you're at home or not, but they might at least stumble in one of your graves and hurt their leg, causing them to maybe lose control over who is their victim the next night...
Allow Arsonist and Serial Killer to be in same game? Might be deadly! ๐ Current: {0}
Arsonist and Serial Killer in same game are now {0}.
